summary: A conversion of the Elven Sage Outfit by DreamBurrows for UNPB-BBP with working weight slider. It requires DreamBurrows\'s original mod.
descriptionHtml:
A conversion of the Elven Sage Outfit by DreamBurrows for UNPB-BBP with working weight slider. It requires DreamBurrows\'s original mod.

English is not my native language so sorry for my mistakes.

Required mods (don\'t forget to endorse them):
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17699]DreamBurrows Sage Outfit Retexture Standalone[/url]
The UNPB body replacer with BBP support: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900/]UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] OR [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/]Troublemakers Clothing[/url]

Does not work without BBP.

Installation:
First install the required mods
Use NMM as usual. Say no to upgrade. Overwrite when asked.
Manual installation: open archive, extract meshes folder into data folder and overwrite when asked.

Credits and thanks:
DreamBurrows for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17699]DreamBurrows Sage Outfit Retexture Standalone[/url]
Backsteppo for the original model: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9387]Dragon Quest 3 Sage Outfit for UNP[/url]
calyps and xp32 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics[/url]
dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
author: belisariu
